content: Change is hard, and change is scary as you say. I believe there is so much denial going on here with so many people. People playing victim and using that as an excuse not to change bad habits. They are playing the blame game often. I love how you say Change Your Beliefs, Instantly Change Your Life and reminding us we are not doomed by our genes and hardwired to remain as we are for the rest of our lives. Thank you for that. Very powerful Marina,
